About
Our Company
ABOUT US
TEAM
WE’RE BRIGHTLINE
Nice to meet you.
At Brightline, we’re all on a ride to a destination that matters. Brightline is the only privately owned and operated intercity railroad in the United States. We’re not here to brag, but that does mean we do things a bit differently.
Life at Brightline
Ride Brighter.
We’re building easy, efficient, and eco-friendly routes between some of the country's best cities. With a focus on sustainability, it's a safer, greener way to travel and protect the environment. If you ask us, it's also a lot more fun. From in-station lounges complete with charcuterie to seamless transfers to get you from our stations to your door, we're making everyday travel a little bit better every day.
2017
Brightline was founded to create a solution for routes that are too long to drive, but too short to fly. We’ve also made it a priority to make sure every guest has some fun along the way.
600+
We’re currently a team of over 600 thinkers and doers who all believe travel should be just as fun as it is functional. We’re not just about getting you from Point A to Point B—we do it with a smile.
Over 5 Million
We’ve welcomed millions of passengers aboard since we opened our doors in South Florida, with service between Miami and West Palm Beach. And that’s just the start.
Explore open roles
Did you know?
Our Teammates aren’t just building the future, they’re making it a greener one. So far, our team has planted over 3,000 native trees along our rail corridor to further reduce carbon emissions and help make the communities we serve greener, cleaner, and healthier.
Our Impact
The Movers
Meet the dream team.
Building a brighter future takes a team of dreamers, thinkers, and doers. We’re proud of how far we’ve come, and every day we’re working towards a better tomorrow.
Executive Team
Meet the Executive Team

Menu
Onboard Amenities
Convenience & Comfort
The Experience
We go above and beyond to provide welcoming rides for everyone aboard.
The Classes
Sit Back, relax and enjoy the ride
Each of our large hand-stitched leather seats recline for your comfort alongside full windows. With two ways to ride—SMART or PREMIUM—there’s something for everyone.
SMART
Comfortable business-class option, with an array of food and beverages available for purchase.
Complimentary onboard Wi-Fi
Hand-stitched leather seats
Multiple power & USB Type-A or USB Type-C outlets at each seat
PREMIUM
First-class experience with added amenities to take care of your every need.
Complimentary snacks
Complimentary beverages
Relax at our PREMIUM Lounge
$10 Uber Voucher
Compare Classes
SMART and PREMIUM Fares
Other Features
Enhanced Accessibility
We’re fully ADA-accessible with level boarding to accommodate wheelchairs, strollers and wheeled bags with ease.
Carry-On Storage
With ample room throughout our coaches, your stuff can ride with you. Each coach features overhead storage space, perfect for carry-ons.
View our Terms of Service
Food and Drinks Onboard
SMART Guests can enjoy food, drinks, and more delivered right to their seat — all ride long. Just scan the QR code at your seat to satisfy your cravings.
State-of-the-Art Restrooms
Our restrooms are spacious and provide an innovative hands-free experience.
Pet Friendly
You’re welcome to bring your furry friend along for the ride.
View our Terms of Service
Bring Your Bags
Bring your baggage onboard — or, check them in before your trip with a Guest Service Agent.
Learn more about our baggage policy and fees
.
Stay Connected and Charged
Enjoy free, high-speed Wi-Fi while you ride from station to station.
Interconnected Stations
Each station is in the heart of the city and connects to other transit options.
The Fleet
Our trains were designed with your safety and comfort top of mind
